attributes.action:
Make June 22nd a national bank holiday.

Hangover Day
attributes.additional_details:
With the day before the first day of normality in over a year, a lot of people will be heading out to celebrate. Let them do it without the worry of work the next day.

The country will be bouncing, let’s help the hospitality industry by letting them do what they do best and giving us a night to remember.

With England playing on 22nd too, it gives the country an opportunity to rally behind our team as well! Win win! You know you want too! For the people!
attributes.background:
On June 21st you have decided that we can, after what will then be 15 months of horror, return to some kind of normality.

People will be out and want to celebrate without the headache of going to work hungover, let’s have a national holiday to celebrate everyone’s hard work.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Make June 22nd (or the day after Nightclubs reopen) a bank holiday
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/576510
